comment: Lemma for ~ cnlnadji (Theorem 3.10 of [Beran] p. 104: every continuous linear operator has an adjoint). The value of the auxiliary functional ` G ` . (Contributed by NM, 16-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
